comments.content: Masha Allah, Allah ya sanya alkhairi
Salman ni baka saka suna naba ko?
Masha Allah Ameen ya Allah Allah ya basu zaman lafiya
Muna amsawa Allah ya sanya alkairi ya basu xaman lfy
Allah yasanya alkhairi, yaba da zaman lfy.
Allah yasanya alkairi saura naka muna jira
Comrade Allah ya bada zaman lpy...Allah ya sanya Alheri
muna amsawa Allah y bada zaman lpy
Allah ya bada zaman lafiya, ban san da bikin ba sai aranar.
Duk da baka gaiyace ni ba ina fatan Allah ya basu zaman lafiya
amin, ALLAH( swt) ya bawa ango da amare, zaman lfy. Da iyalai masu albarka
Allah yasanya alkhairi yabawa amare da angunansu zaman lafiya
Allah ya sanya alkhairi a wannan AURE, yakuma bada zaman lafiya.
Allah ya sanya alheri ya bada zaman lfy
Allah yavada zaman lpy stat salman
Ameen thumma ameen Allah ya basu zaman lafiya
Allah yasanya alkhairi, yabasu zaman lafiya yakuma kaimu na yan baya

description: Salmanu Rabiu Gwarzo  added  19 new photos  â€”  feeling thankful with  Ababan Sayyid Riji Tsuani  and  47 others . A madadin Iyalan Alh.  Rabiu Sarkin Fulani Gwarzo  na Mika sakon godiya da bangajiya na samun damar halartar Daurin auren:  Sani Rabiu Sarkin Fulani.   Khadija Rabiu Sarkin fulani  Hauwa'u Rabiu Sarkin Fulani.   Wanda ya gudana a ranar Asabar 5/8/2017. ya samu halartar manyan baki kamar haka:  =Tsohon Kwamishinan harkokin gidan gwamnati kuma Chairman Governing Council FCE kwantagora (Comrade . Aminu  Abdussalam Gwarzo)   =Tsohon Sanatan Kano ta arewa Kuma Managing Director na Bankunan Microfinance na jihar Kano (Hon. Dr.  Maikano Rabiu)   =Area Commander na mopol.   =Wakilin Kwamishinan kananan hukumomi na jihar Kano Hon. Alh. Murtala    sule Garo.  =Wakilan Mai girma mataimakin gwamnan jihar Kano His Excellency prof. Hafizu abubakar.   =Shugaban matasa na jihar Kano (Comr.  Kabiru Ado Lakwaya ) tare da yan tawagarsa.  =Wakilin Dan majalisar tarayya Mai wakiltar Gwarzo da Kabo Hon.  Sule Nasiru  Garo.   =Dan Majalisar jiha mai wakiltar Gwarzo Hon.  Rabi'u Sale  liliko.  =Babban Hadimi a gidan Tsohon sanata Mai wakiltar Kano ta arewa Hon. Saidu Gwadabe Gwarzo.   =Tsohon kantoman karamar hukumar Gwarzo (Alh.  Ahmad Kado  Bichi)   =Deputy Police officer na Gwarzo   Da sauran manyan baki, yanuwa da Abokan arziki daga sassa daban-daban.   Godiya ta musamman ga manyan Abokaina yan social media irinsu:   Abdullahi Magaji Rimin Gado   Usman Abdullahi Gwarzo   Ibrahim Sarauniya  D/tofa   Mubarak A Lawan   Abdulrahman Getso   Ishaq Usman Ofr   Sayyadi Dayyabu Mahuta   Mujtaba Ahmad Na Kowa   Shehu Mansur Sule   Ahmad Prince Gandujiyya   Nazifi Yusif Aliyu Tumfafi   Bello Gwarzo   Jamiluabdullahi Muhammad   Amiru Umar Chiroma   Zaharaddeen Salisu Usman   Saifuddeen Abubakar Sallau   Adda'u Zakari Gwarzo   Yusif Muhd Riga   Harisu Abdullahi Galadima   Salis Shariff   Aminu Sani Lakwaya   Engr Sani Abdullahi Wudil   Aminu Sani Grz   Ka'e Gwarzo   Salisu Muhammad Kosawa   Muktar I. Bako Getso   Mukhtar Ahmed Usher Gwarzo   Nura Umar Na'abba   Kabiru Sabiu Kab's  malam  Murtala Sani   Garkuwar Murtala Sule Garo   Sadeeq Sani Haruna Gwarzo   Zakariyya B Sadeeq Zaksad   Abraham Job Gwarzo   Imran Ismail Lafiya Jari   Dan Allahaji Gwarzo   Bala Garba Gwarzo   Abba Alex Gwarzo   Aminu A. Kutama  Abokaina da mukayi karatu  a Primary school irinsu :  Kabiru Ali  Abdulkarimu  Tijjani   Musbahu Zubairu    GTC Bagauda irinsu:  Zdeen Abubakar Gandun Albasa.   Salis Umar Dangwamna Hausawa.   Sani Abdullahi wudili  Ashiru mansir  Gano  Abdullahi Ibrahim kayyu  Yusif Sani Getso.  sai kuma Wanda mukayi  ND statistics a School of  Technology Kano kuma yanzu muke yin Degree a Kano  University of science and Technology Wudi, Aspirant  Statistics Yusif  Hassan  saye.  Godiya Mara adadi ga wadanda  suka  kiramu a waya, turo sako da Wadanda suka rinka posting na fatan Alkhairi a social media da Wadanda sukayi niyyar zuwa amma  Allah baiba su damar  halartar ba saboda yanayi  na uzurirrika muna godiya  Allah  ya kara  zumunci. Dafatan kowa da kowa ya koma gida lafiya.   wadanda suka samu halartar amma baa anbace su don Allah suyi Mani uzuri saboda yanayi  Na Rubutu. mun gode mun gode. Allah  ya kaimu na yan  baya lafiya.
